Name: Chimes
About the game: Chimes is a Multiplayer game with fun in every corner. You can watch people battle in incredible scenery, or sit back and take all the nature in with your friends! Chimes PvP is dynamic, if you want to fight hand to hand go for it! Or do you want to do tricks like bashing the enemy into something, pulling out your sword and shoving the enemy into the great abyss. It's all about the players choices. With an revolving map that never stops changing! Chimes also allows players to interact with each other, by having complete control of the characters body and face.
